name: Drug Simulator: Torn
description:
Your mother is very sick and your father has left. You can't get a job because you keep getting denied. So you start a small drug market in an alleyway. The money required is 23k. Your mother either dies or lives.

The game has now chapters, 6 to be exact, with the ending which counts as a chapter.

CHAPTER 1 - Productivity and Bacteria

CHAPTER 2 - Stones of Depression

CHAPTER 3 - Sharp Mile Reaching

CHAPTER 4 - Blending

CHAPTER 5 - End
